sub_title: B2B and B2C Support Coordinator at Tiqets - Enabling Accessible Culture | Expertise in Cultural Project Management, Process Improvement, and Insight Analytics | Passionate Advocate for Sustainable and DEI Practices
summary:
My passion for making culture accessible to all, fostering social change, and driving innovation has led me to pursue a career where I can create a positive impact by promoting accessibility for clients, institutions, companies, and artists while delivering valuable results. 

Following my professional goal, I work at Tiqets as a Support Coordinator where I specialize in coordinating between stakeholders, both B2B and B2C, to deliver exceptional support for diverse inquiries. I am adept at handling a wide range of customer/supplier/distributor interactions and ensuring their needs are met effectively and efficiently. Additionally, I actively contribute to the improvement of processes and products by updating and analyzing them for better performance.

Skills: 

📣 Communication skills and adaptability: Proficient in coordinating different stakeholders, ensuring exceptional support delivery and effectively communicating with stakeholders and team members.

🛠️ Operations Optimization: Competent in identifying areas for improvement and implementing strategies to optimize operations, resulting in tangible results and improved overall performance.

👥 Audience/User-Centric Mindset: Adept at combining data analysis, human-centred design, and marketing strategies to develop audience-centric strategies (especially for cultural institutions). 

🔎 Data-Driven Insights: Proficient in analyzing visitor data and gaining valuable insights to inform strategic decision-making, effective marketing strategies, and product enhancements.

⏳ Project Management: Experienced in orchestrating successful public programs and projects by identifying and allocating project resources and developing comprehensive project plans.

🗣️ DEI Advisor: Committed to improving strategic and operational inclusion and diversity within organizations, fostering a more inclusive and equitable workplace.

My fascination for creative solutions to address climate change, cultural innovation, user experience, digital marketing, and DEI topics motivates me to learn and develop my skills continuously. I am eager to explore fresh approaches and connect with like-minded individuals who share the same passion!

📩 A person is more than a LinkedIn bio. Do you want to know more about me? Drop me a message or an email!

contributors.headline: B2B and B2C Support Coordinator at Tiqets - Enabling Accessible Culture | Expertise in Cultural Project Management, Process Improvement, and Insight Analytics | Passionate Advocate for Sustainable and DEI Practices

projects.title: CULTURISH

contributors.headline: B2B and B2C Support Coordinator at Tiqets - Enabling Accessible Culture | Expertise in Cultural Project Management, Process Improvement, and Insight Analytics | Passionate Advocate for Sustainable and DEI Practices

profile_positions.description:
Tiqets is a technology company that offers an online platform for booking admission tickets to various museums, attractions, and activities in cities around the world. Tiqets partners with over 3,000 venues in more than 60 countries worldwide and has served millions of customers since its inception in 2014.

Key responsibilities:
• Coordinating between first-tier and external stakeholders (B2B and B2C) to deliver exceptional support while aligning with team qualitative and quantitative OKRs.
• Managing a high volume of inbound emails, chats, and Jiras related to order handling, rescheduling, cancellations, and refunds by maintaining a professional and friendly tone.
• Acting as the main point of contact for customers and suppliers, collaborating closely with the sales and operations teams to swiftly resolve customer issues and escalations, ensuring timely and effective resolutions.
• Enhancing the daily workflow of the team by implementing improved methods and processes, streamlining operations and maximizing efficiency.
• Maintaining meticulous records and documentation of issues and resolutions in a dedicated database, enabling sales and executive management teams to review and provide feedback for product improvement.
• Skillfully handling Paypal cases, diligently identifying fraud, and addressing internal or external issues to safeguard the company's interests.
• Providing valuable feedback for Helpcenter articles and guidelines, contributing to the enhancement of client support and website clarity.
• Managing and analyzing customer reviews across various platforms, including Tiqets' website, Facebook, Trustpilot, Apple Store, and Google Play. Through a deep analysis of each customer's experience, I identified areas for improvement to enhance our products.
• Knight - DEI advisor: working towards improving the strategic and operational inclusion and diversity within the organization.
profile_positions.title: Support Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
De Structura is a multidimensional pan-European initiative that strives to create more opportunities for young people in the art sector. By investigating and researching the current art and cultural sector, De Structura is providing support to young artists at the beginning of their careers.

Key responsibilities: 
•  Orchestrated a highly successful Forum in Estonia, specifically in Tallinn and Narva, which brought together 70 participants representing 15 nationalities. This involved organizing a public program in Narva and in Tallinn.
• Collaborated with the core team to establish a clear mission and vision for the project, drawing upon academic references and utilizing frameworks such as the theory of change and business model canvas to ensure a well-defined direction.
• Provided valuable support to different departments, assisting with daily tasks and promoting effective interdepartmental communication. This involved handling funding and advocacy applications, creating organizational documents, and facilitating meetings with stakeholders, partners, and participants.
• Conducted thorough research to identify potential advocacy and partnership opportunities, maintaining regular communication with external stakeholders.
• Offered guidance and assistance to participants involved in think tanks, providing them with supporting information, facilitating brainstorming sessions, and fostering collaboration.
• Supported project groups in their funding applications and various stages of development, while also addressing challenges associated with creating and managing artistic and cultural projects.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
The Student Representatives (SR) are the voice of the Faculty’s students. Our main goal is to improve FASoS education environment by representing the interest of all FASoS students in most decision-making bodies of the Faculty. 

Key responsibilities:
• Collaborated with the marketing and communications team to develop and execute campaigns and initiatives aimed at promoting student life, academic programs, and events.
• Utilized social media and other digital platforms to engage with students, share information, and solicit feedback.
• Assisted with the development of marketing collateral, including posters, flyers, and digital content.
• Promoted and organized Faculty Drinks with over 250 students involved.
profile_positions.title: Team Marketing and Communication

profile_positions.description:
Student Representatives are a vital channel of communication between the professor and students – representing, communicating and giving feedback on programme and student matters.

Key responsibilities:
• Represented the student body at the Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences by providing feedback and suggestions to faculty and administration on behalf of students.
• Facilitated communication between students, faculty, and administration to promote an inclusive and positive campus culture.
• Organized and participated in meetings with various student groups, professors and faculty council to discuss and address concerns and initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Education Programme Committee

profile_positions.description:
SCHUNCK is a cultural meeting point that combines a museum, a school of music and dance, and a public library in the iconic Glaspaleis (Heerlen). 

My duty for this internship was to develop an audience development plan to attract under 30 visitors to SCHUNCK museum while trying to communicate the three different souls of the interdisciplinary center (music/dance, library, and art/architecture)

Key responsibilities:
• Conducted in-depth research on cultural participation trends in the Netherlands and specifically in Heerlen, analyzing relevant data and interviewing HBO students in Heerlen. Based on this research, I developed comprehensive cultural profiles for young visitor personas.
• Designed and implemented a range of activities tailored to the interests and characteristics of our visitors, considering their entire journey through our museum. This involved creating a seamless user experience (UX), planning social media campaigns, and events by adhering to fixed deadlines for each activity.
• Conducted extensive research on best practices for engaging young audiences in museum activities, examining and comparing national and international case studies to identify innovative approaches.
• Analyzed SCHUNCK's strategy and vision for the next four years using tools such as the business model canvas, SWOT analysis, PEST analysis, and marketing mix evaluation. This assessment provided valuable insights to inform future strategic planning.

If you are interested in this report, drop me a message!
profile_positions.title: Cultural Engagement Specialist

profile_positions.description:
The Amsterdam Museum, founded in 1926, is a city museum that presents exhibitions on a wide range of urban and national issues. One prime example is the De Gouden Koets (The Golden Coach) exhibition, a presentation, and dialogue around one of the most contested Dutch heritage. 

As a project in collaboration with Maastricht University, the main goal was to create a report to assess the curation of the De Gouden Koets exhibition and a strategy for interpreting and presenting the research material collected and generated during the exhibition/research project De Gouden Koets.

Key responsibilities:
• Analyzed audience data to gain insights into visitor demographics, preferences, and behaviours.
• Assessed the museum's accessibility initiatives and identified areas for improvement to enhance visitor experience.
• Addressed data limitations to ensure the accuracy and reliability of findings.
• Aligned data analysis with the museum's mission and vision to support strategic decision-making.
• Developed effective marketing strategies to promote the museum's exhibitions and programs through benchmarking with different exhibitions regarding contested heritage.
• Proposed a co-creation process (emphatic approach) and a human-centered design approach for the permanent display of collected data.

If you are interested in this report, drop me a message!
profile_positions.title: External Collaborator: Audience Engagement Specialist & Insight Analyst

profile_positions.description:
ARS Art Space is a small NGO based in Milan with the aim to present national and international emerging artists in the Milan art scene.

Key responsibilities:
• Talent scouting: maintained constant communication with artists, ensuring their high level of satisfaction and delivering a seamless experience throughout the entire exhibition process.
• Account management: managed sponsorships and partnerships with small realities, including wineries, to help support Ars Art Space's mission and provide added value to our patrons.
• Website and content Management: updated the Ars Art Space website, ensuring the content was up-to-date and relevant and created a content calendar and drafted social media posts to promote each exhibition and engage our audience.
• Exhibition set up and dismantling: responsible for setting up and dismantling DREAMARS and AMARS II exhibitions, ensuring that all logistics were executed seamlessly and on-time.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Curator and Talent Scouting

profile_positions.description:
MIA Photo Fair is one of the most important photographic fairs in Italy with more than 25.000 in four days and a successful sale rate for galleries of 80%. 

Gallery assistant for Admira Gallery specializing in Italian Neorealism photography.

Key responsibilities:
• Visitor assistant to almost 200 visitors: responsible for providing information about the photographs on display and prices in English and Italian to ensure all visitors received the information they needed.
• Sales assistant: assisted in the sale of four photographs, contributing to the gallery's success and revenue generation.
profile_positions.title: Gallery Assistant

profile_positions.description:
The network of house museums in Milan includes Bagatti Valsecchi Museum, the Boschi di Stefano Historic House Museum, the Necchi Campiglio Villa and the Poldi Pezzoli Museum. The main aim of this network is to promote the history of nearly two centuries of Milan’s cultural and artistic heritage seen through the eyes of relevant figures of the 19th and 20th centuries.

Key responsibilities:
• Blogging: published three blog articles about the history of home museums in Milan, as well as an article featuring the owner of Casa Museo Boschi di Stefano. 
• Podcast creation: drafted descriptive podcasts for people with impaired vision, highlighting the importance of accessibility in the art world and examined best practices to promote these podcasts to a larger public.
• First tester of the new Chatbot system by Invisible Studio.
profile_positions.title: Blogger Intern

profile_positions.description:
Wikimania is the annual conference centred on the Wikipedia project. The 2016 edition was held in a small mountain village on the shores of Lake Como, Esino Lario, for 8 days.

Key responsibilities:
• Practical event management (managed different conferences in multiple places and assisted participants' needs) and communication with the participants of the event in different languages (EN, ES, IT)
• Web registration through an event management software
• Attended different Wikimania conferences to understand deeply how Wikipedia works
profile_positions.title: Event Staff

volunteer_experiences.description:
Winternights is an art initiative offering a stage for work-in-progress of "their" talents from the performing arts of today. At surprising locations in Maastricht, visitors see new, "unfinished" work by promising theatre makers, performers, choreographers, composers and visual artists.

Tasks:
• Client service: giving information to visitors, supporting artists, handling bookings.

Viewmaster Projects has been organising large-scale and striking video art exhibitions in public spaces with themes that directly relate to public space and its users. One striking example is Street View, an exhibition focusing on the concept of public space around the world.

Tasks: 
• Client service: giving information in English and basic Dutch.

Teatro Invito is a small theatre in Lecco organising different theatre shows in surprising locations.

Tasks:
• Ticket office
• Usherette

PIME TUTTA UN'ALTRA FESTA FESTIVAL is a festival promoting different cultures around the world. It was held in Milan from 20th-22nd May 2016.

Tasks:
• Guided tour in the ethnographic museum of PIME
• Children entertainer
